de.fu_berlin.maniac.packet_builder

Class PacketBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fu_berlin.maniac.packet_builder.PacketBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketBuilderInterface

    public class PacketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketBuilderInterface
    Singleton.
    The PacketBuilder builds Packets (duh) either - from incoming raw data - from the packet proceeding the packet being built (i.e. to build an Advert you must've first received Data ) It is also being used to generate sendable data (UDP /TCP) from Packet Objects.
    Author:
    maniacchallenge

      • buildCheck

        public Packet buildCheck(java.lang.String rawData)
        Builds a Check from a String (since all Data sent over TCP is sent as Strings this method uses Strings rather than byte[]).
        The String's format is as follows:
        Starting with the Packet type, followed by the information divided by spaces. A $ marks the end of a chunk of data. example:
        "C transactionID amount balance $"
        Specified by:
        buildCheck in interface PacketBuilderInterface
        Parameters:
        rawData - Packet data, received as a String
        Returns:
        Check built from given Data
